items.title: Tensorflow 2.0: AttributeError: Tensor.name is meaningless when eager execution is enabled
items.body:
Keep getting these errors with tensorflow 2.0. Is this supposed to work? 

import tensorflow as tf
import numpy as np

x = tf.constant(3.0)
with tf.GradientTape() as t:
    t.watch(x)
    y = (x - 10) ** 2
    opt = tf.optimizers.Adam()
    opt.minimize(lambda: y, var_list=[x])
